revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_MStaffTrack}} '''A_MStaffTrack'''
(no parameters)
If the calling actor has no tracer (i.e.: intended victim), there's an about 20% chance it tries to acquire one within a range of 10 units. Whether the above happened or not, the codepointer then calls [[A_SeekerMissile]](2, 10). This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|MageStaffFX2}} and derived classes. [[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Missile movement functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:MStaffTrack}}
